entities.description: Use of marijuana through vaping in the past 30 days.
Use of marijuana by dabbing waxes, shatter, or concentrate in the past 30 days.
Use of marijuana by eating or drinking in the past 30 days.
Use of marijuana by drops, strips, lozenges, or sprays in the mouth in the past 30 days.
Use of marijuana by applying lotion, cream, or patch to the skin in the past 30 days.
